00022 #ifndef _QCPROBESETOPTIONS_H_
00023 #define _QCPROBESETOPTIONS_H_
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include <cstring>
00027 #include <map>
00028 #include <string>
00029 #include <utility>
00030 #include <vector>
00031 //
00032 
00033 /// A simple class which contains various QC probeset information.
00034 /// Typically populated from the QCC file.
00035 class QCProbesetOptions {
00036 public:
00037 
00038   QCProbesetOptions();
00039   /// Indicates if the primary key is probeset name or ID
00040   bool useNames;
00041 
00042   /// A map keyed by the groupName(label) of probeset name (or IDs) vector
00043   // the extra char is for the ligation base.
00044   typedef std::pair<std::string,std::string> nameLigationBase_t;
00045   std::map<std::string, std::vector<nameLigationBase_t> > probesetGroups;
00046 
00047   bool m_hasLigationBase;
00048 
00049   /// A vector of probesets flagged for inclusion in CHP header
00050   std::vector<std::string> headerProbesets;
00051 
00052         /* need to carry the following forward */
00053         //bool multichannel;
00054         //std::vector<string> metaCelFileNames;
00055         //vector<vector<string> > metaCelFiles; //channel then file index
00056   std::string m_sketchInFile;
00057   std::string m_channelFile;
00058         std::string m_exprAnalysisString;
00059 
00060   // where the DiskIntensityMart should put its temp files.
00061   std::string m_tempdir;
00062 
00063   /**
00064    * Read in a QCC File and populate a QCProbesetOptions instance
00065    * @param qccFileName - the name of the qcc file to load
00066    * @param opts - the QCProbesetOptions instance to populate
00067    */
00068   static void readQCCFile(const std::string& qccFileName,
00069                           QCProbesetOptions& opts);
00070 
00071   /// Virtual Destructor
00072   virtual ~QCProbesetOptions() {
00073   };
00074 
00075 private:
00076   /**
00077    * Private utility method to split up the group column
00078    * @param str - the string to parse
00079    * @param val - the parsed out group to be filled in
00080    * @param sep - separator between groups (default ',')
00081    * @param return - bool indicating if there are more groups
00082    */
00083   static bool SplitGroups(std::string& str, std::string& val,const char sep=',');
00084 };
00085 
00086 #endif // _QCPROBESETOPTIONS_H_
